friend of Democratic congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords , has visited the lawmaker in her hospital room and is in close contact with her astronaut husband Mark Kelly, she told NBC's" Meet The Press." Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said." It's an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury," she added. The 40-year-old Gabrielle Giffords has survived despite being shot through the head

Mitt Romney appeared on" Piers Morgan " and" The View" as part of a two-day media tour in conjunction with the paperback release of his book No Apology: The Case for American Greatness. He also appeared on Good Morning America and read the Top Ten List on" The Late Show with David Letterman ." the original mean judge Simon Cowell . Over the past nine seasons, the smug Brit with the snug V-necks has become famous for comparing one contestant to" a cat being thrown off a skyscraper," telling another, Don't mean to be rude, but you look like the Hulk's wife, reducing dozens of hopefuls to their worst" ugly cry"- and propelling the show to the No. 1 spot in the process. He said Republicans rebuffed Democratic attempts to reach a deal on handling amendments quickly. We have tried every way we can to involve the minority, he said." We recognize a filibuster by amendment when we see it." When Mike Pence was asked why seeking a recorded vote on an amendment that both sides supported wasn't a stall tactic, he grinned

he is stepping down from his post as Google's chief executive this April- a move that could send shockwaves felt from the search giant's Mountain View headquarters to its Washington D.C. shop. As Executive Chairman, Sen. Joe Lieberman will focus wherever Sen. Joe Lieberman can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach..., Eric Schmidt posted to Google's official blog. The leadership shakeup- which has Sergey Brin taking the title of co-founder, focusing on new products- could portend new opportunities for Google in Washington. VIDEO:
